sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer">
    <v-container class="bg-red" style="height: 100%">
      <v-row no-gutters>
        <v-column>
          <v-list>
            <v-list-item
              v-for="(item, index) in items"
              :key="index"
              :value="item"
            ></v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-column>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  name: "NavDrawer",
  props: {},
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      items: [
        { "text": "Home", "url": "home", "icon": "mdi-home" },
        { "text": "Home", "url": "home", "icon": "mdi-home" },
        { "text": "Home", "url": "home", "icon": "mdi-home" },
      ]
    };
  },
  methods: {
    openDrawer() {
      this.drawer = !this.drawer;
    },
  },
};
</script>
